A: 1. What's "MY MOUTH" in French? (a) Mon next (b) Ma bouche (c) Ma tête
2. What's "MY NOSE" in French? (a) Mon nex (b) Mon nez (c) Mon cou
3. What's "MY EYEBROW" in French? (a) Mon oeil (b) Mon front (c) Mon sourcil
4. How do you say "MY NECK" in French? (a) Mon mouth (b) Mon chin (c) Mon cou
5. How do you say "MY CHIN" in French? (a) Mon mouth (b) Mon leg (c) Mon menton
6. What's "MY HAIR" in French? (a) Mes cheveux (b) Ma tête (c) Mon front
7. How do you say "FRIDAY" in French? (a) Lundi (b) Mecredi (c) Vendredi
8. What's "MY FOREHEAD" in French? (a) Mon sourcil (b) Mon front (c) Mon cou
9. Bon après midi means _________ (a) Good morning (b) Good afternoon (c) Good evening
10. "We are delighted to see you" in French is __________ (a) Nous sommes enchantés de Vous voir (b) Je suis occupé maintenant (c) Je suis ravi de te voir
11. In French, "ENVIE" means __________ (a) Happy (b) Desire (c) Appreciation
12. What does "TRE BIEN DORMIE?" mean? (a) Good to see you (b) Hope you're doing well (c) Did you sleep well?
13. What does "BONJOUR PROFESSEUR" mean? (a) Good morning friends (b) Good morning teachers (c) Good morning Madam
14. What does "BONJOUR MONSIEUR" mean? (a) Good afternoon Sir (b) Good evening Sir (c) Good morning Sir
15. What does "ÀU REVOIR LA CLASSE" mean? (a) Good evening class (b) Good night class (c) Good bye class
16. How do you say "I am delighted to see you" in French? (a) Nous sommes enchantés de te voir (b) Nous sommes enchantés de vous voir (c) Je suis ravi de te voir
17. Levez-vous la classe means what? (a) Class greet (b) Class stand (c) Class sit
18. Merci beaucoup means _________ (a) Thank you very much (b) Welcome (c) Good night
19. Àu revoir Monsieur means _________ (a) Thank you very much Sir (b) Good morning Sir (c) Good bye Sir
20. Bonjour mes amies means __________ (a) Good morning children (b) Good morning teachers (c) Good morning friends
21. What does "Donc aide-moi Dieu" mean? (a) So help me God (b) Trust and obey (c) I am a Nigerian
22. What does "Le Nigeria ne te saluons" mean? (a) I love Nigeria (b) I am a Nigerian (c) Nigeria we hail thee
23. What does "Notra drapeau sera symbole" mean? (a) I can't see the symbol (b) Our flag shall be a symbol (c) I want to draw a symbol
24. What is "Comme-ci comme-ca" in English? (a) Like this like that (b) Like that like this (c) Like this like this
25. "Good morning friends" in French is ___________ (a) Bonjour petit (b) Bonjour mes Amie's (c) Bonjour monsieur
26. "Did you sleep well" in French is __________ (a) Tre Bien dormie? (b) Comment àava? (c) Comment se àpassé ke travail?
27. What is "Ferme ta bouche" in English? (a) Close your mouth (b) Open your mouth (c) Clear the bush
28. "Repetez encore" means _________ (a) Repeat after me (b) Repeat it again (c) Stand still
29. "Oh Dieu de la création" means what? (a) Nigeria is a great nation (b) Oh God of all creation (c) We are His creation
30. What does comment tu t'apelle? mean? (a) What is her name? (b) What is his name? (c) What is your name?
31. What does "Donc aide moi Dieu" mean? (a) Praise the Lord (b) To God be the glory (c) So help me God
